title: Cant find a main
body: I've been playing league and I cant seem to find a main champion. I use to main Warwick but idk if I should try playing him again or try other champions. I seem to just rotate my positions and its hurting my LP pretty hard I dont know who to play and stick with if anyone has suggestions that would be helpful.

replies.body: You dont find your main. Your main finds you.
So he should play Warwick because of his trail?
Play every single champion in the game and find one you like. I recommend ARAM to do this.
What role do you like playing on? I suggest lulu or you should try every champion during free week.
I dont really have 1 role i like playing I like Jg Mid and Top

Teemo, top,mid,jgl,adc and best... support.

Free 3 wards every 30s ultimate?
dont main a champ if you cant find one, just master all of them
